name: Happy Fret
overview: Micro Cabin's Happy Fret could almost say that it is a mythical platforming action game for many MSX users. It came in the Philips gold series pack and it was a complete enigma for all of us, since the vast majority of us weren't even able to a single object in the right place. But through persistence and grit you can learn how to move forward in this game and it will open up to you.
